thread.title: NFF Endorse Odegbami For FIFA Presidency
thread.title_full: NFF Endorse Odegbami For FIFA Presidency

author: Prince Imehiron
title: NFF Endorse Odegbami For FIFA Presidency
text:
Headlines / NFF Endorse Odegbami For FIFA Presidency NFF Endorse Odegbami For FIFA Presidency Headlines , Top Stories 
By Bamidele Boluwaji: 
The Nigeria Football Federation have endorsed former Green Eagles star, Chief Segun Odegbami, as the country's candidate at the upcoming Federation International Football Association presidential election. 
Complete Sports reliable source informed that the football house on Friday decided to give Odegbami the go-ahead to be the country's sole candidate at the election. 
Former Governor of Abia State, Chief Orji Uzor Kalu, whose reign in the state saw Enyimba FC winning the CAF Champions League twice was also in the race but with the NFF endorsement for Chief Odegbami who helped Nigeria to win the 1980 African Cup of Nations and other clubs competitions, this means the entire country would have to back the ex-international. 
When Complete Sports contacted Chief Odegbami about the development, he said: "I haver only been hearing it, many people have been calling to ask but i have not been called officially from the FA but I hope it is true." 
The election is expected to be held on February 26 in Switzerland.
